text: usee ke lie sachchee pukaar hai. usase hatakar jinako ve pukaarate hai, ve unakee pukaar ka kuchh bhee uttar nahin dete. bas yah aisa hee hota hai jaise koee apane donon haath paanee kee or isalie phailae ki vah usake munh mein pahunch jae, haalaanki vah usatak pahunchanevaala nahin. kufr karanevaalon kee pukaar to bas bhatakane hee ke lie hotee hai
